original_title: Joe Bonamassa Live at ACL April 2021
overview: TWO TIME GRAMMY-nominated Joe Bonamassa is breaking out the blues-rock power trio in an epic CONCERT on Thursday, April 1st.  This virtual event will bring fans together around the world as Bonamassa broadcasts to their living room in an unforgettable night of guitar wizardry! With a setlist chosen by Bonamassa fans, this specially curated power trio set will not disappoint.
title: Joe Bonamassa Live at ACL April 2021
